word:
God has assured us that it is possible to serve Him in holiness: "Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for He hath visited and redeemed His people, . . . to perform the mercy promised to our fathers, and to remember His holy covenant; the oath which He sware to our father Abraham that He would grant unto us, that 


                                -360- 

we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve Him without fear, in holiness and righteousness before Him, all the days of our life" [Luke 1:68-75].
